name: overfeed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to give a person or animal too much food: Many owners accidentally overfeed their pets. It's difficult to overfeed a breast-fed baby.
More examplesFewer examplesThe breed tends to gain weight easily, so should not be overfed.Overfeeding babies during the first few weeks of life can lead to them suffering disrupted sleep, researchers have found.When people in one study were overfed by 1,000 calories a day, there were remarkable differences in weight gain.
